description:
Beelzebub, the Sixth Mortal Sin of Gluttony, is running underground eating parties when Lucifer decides to crash one of them. Beelzebub is challenged to an eating contest by Lucifer, but when they both eat as much as they can, Lucifer becomes ill and ends up in the hospital. Her magic should prevent her from getting sick, but she`s severely weakened. Will her time in the hospital bring her some humility?
Source: crunchyroll
